entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangirsuk Airport 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -39.2°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -60
Dewpoint: -43.0°C
Wind: W 43 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 60 this morning and minus 54 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 60. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
